keywords.name: Chemistmod:finale
keywords.description: Cost reduced by 1 when certain elements are Infused. Playing a Finale resets the cost of all cards with the same name. Finale card costs cannot be randomized.

keywords.name: Chemistmod:infuse
keywords.description: Infusing a Flask activates its effects.

keywords.name: Chemistmod:lightning
keywords.description: Flask. Reduces the cost of the top card of your draw pile by 1 this combat.

keywords.name: Chemistmod:withdrawl
keywords.description: Effect triggers if no Flasks have been Infused this turn.
